title: Bonds, ETFs, Ukraine, and Crypto (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bonds, ETFs, Ukraine, and Crypto (Podcast)
description:
George Bory, Chief Investment Strategist, Fixed Income with AllSpring Global Investments, joins the show to discuss which sectors he sees as performing the strongest amid economic headwinds. Retired US Navy Admiral James Stavridis on Ukraine, Taiwan, and other geopolitical tensions. Sylvia Jablonkski, CIO at Defiance, and Eric Balchunas, Senior ETF analyst with Bloomberg Intelligence, join the show in-studio for a roundtable to discuss ETF flows and stocks. Alison Williams, Senior Global Banks and Asset Managers analyst with Bloomberg Intelligence, joins the show to discuss UBS, Deutsche bank, bank earnings in the UK, and JPMorgan and Goldman CEOs predicting recession. Matt Levine, Bloomberg Opinion columnist, joins us in studio to discuss his recent crypto piece for Bloomberg Businessweek. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Katie Greifeld.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
